definition: science fiction/abbr. for 科學幻想|科学幻想[ke1 xue2 huan4 xiang3]
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: To explain why, let's dream up a science-fiction transportation system.
sentences.chinese: 爲了解釋原因，我們設想科幻小說中的交通系統。

sentences.english: This is Mr. Linghu say "sci-fi magazine, " magical realism of play.
sentences.chinese: 這就是令狐先生說的《科幻雜誌》所玩的魔幻現實。

sentences.english: How would you like to be the author of the greatest science- fiction story ever written?
sentences.chinese: 你願意成爲有史以來最偉大的科幻小說的作者嗎？

sentences.english: This science fiction film lends itself well to wide screen.
sentences.chinese: 這部科幻電影是適合於寬銀幕播放的。

sentences.english: Dr. Kaku uses amazing technologies to create working designs for our sci-fi future.
sentences.chinese: 加來博士用神奇科技替科幻未來創造工藝設計。

sentences.english: Evidently a furry is someone who is an enthusiast of science fiction and fantasy where the heroes are animals.
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的人是當然是指科幻迷啦。

sentences.english: A children’s science fiction movie, the ET won the Academy Award in 1982.
sentences.chinese: 一部兒童科幻電影，贏得過1982年的奧斯卡獎。

sentences.english: It used to be that you could only find the bionic man or woman in science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 過去只能在科幻小說中看到仿生人。

sentences.english: "The Matrix" rewrote the text book for movie science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 駭客帝國爲科幻電影重新改寫了教科書。

sentences.english: The power of invisibility may soon be more than just a sci-fi fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 隱形能力可能很快使科幻小說中的幻想成爲現實。

sentences.english: Horror films and thrillers and science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖片和驚險片還有科幻片。

sentences.english: My favorite sci-fi effect is the Balrog in Lord of the Rings.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的科幻效果就是魔戒炎魔。

sentences.english: Well. For what? the science fiction?
I like science fictions, so I searched under that catagory.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡看科幻片，於是就在科幻類下搜索。

sentences.english: I like science fictions, so I searched under that catagory.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡看科幻片，於是就在科幻類下搜索。

sentences.english: Instead, sci-fi films should be all about imagination.
sentences.chinese: 相反，科幻電影應該是充滿想象力的。

definition: Futurism (artistic and social movement of the 20th century)
Futurism (artistic and social movement of the 20th century)
martial arts chivalry (Chinese literary, theatrical and cinema genre)/knight-errant
Liu Cixin (1963-), Chinese science fiction writer
